long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TextToVoice allows you to listen to text directly from any webpage with a simple right-click. This extension is perfect for multitaskers, language learners, or anyone who prefers listening to reading.

Key Features:

1. One-Click Access: Right-click on selected text and choose "Start Text-to-Speech" to begin listening.
2. Customizable Settings: Adjust voice pitch, speed (rate), and language preferences to suit your needs.
3. User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive design makes it easy to use for all age groups.
Wide Language Support: Select from various voices and languages available through your browser's Web Speech API.

How to Use:

1. Highlight text on any webpage.
2. Right-click and choose Start Text-to-Voice.
3. Enjoy listening with your preferred settings!
